name: RTD Tower Defence
description:
Tower defence game made in 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2022.

You must defend your base from hordes of enemies with your defence towers. 

Towers are decided by random dice rolls so it's different every time

  • 4 enemy types
  • 36 different tower combinations with unique looks and stats
  • 22 waves of enemies, each harder than the last
